title: Data & Visual Analytics
description: The course introduces students to analysis and visualization of complex high dimensional data.  Both theory and applications will be covered including several practical case studies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 2605 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and MATH 3215 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
